title: Hire Farhan Rizvi to design Minimal Ecommerce UI Kit
body:
Hey everyone,

Hereby the official vote to hire Farhan Rizvi.

Assignment: Design Minimal Ecommerce UI Kit
Payment: 0.7Ξ ($3010) or 1.225Ξ ($5,284.65) with bonus applied.

Farhan has designed our previous two UI kits, which look absolutely stunning, and I would love to work with him again on another kit.

----- APPLICATION ----
New application for Minimal Ecommerce UI with a bounty of 0.7Eth.

Name: Farhan Rizvi.
Portfolio URL: https://dribbble.com/farhanrizvi.
Social Media: https://twitter.com/heyfarhanrizvi.
Intro: Hey,

I am a professional UI Designer and working on UI Kits from last 5-6 years. I have a very wide knowledge on creating UI Kits and landing pages, I know how the blocks would perform together and how the final result would look. 

Fun fact about me: I am the designer of first 2 UI Kits of Rareblocks and I feel very proud about it!.

This person applied with the following design:
https://www.figma.com/file/foQ42IOfNkJBfOUcRc0OXC/Rareblocks---Minimal-eCommerce?node-id=0%3A1.

----- VOTE BELOW -----
author: 0x1bCbbd7f9415768338f92A9B8758fa4ABeE4FFD0
